the game is hella fun!!! so hard to get blood points and level up characters which is why newbies dont stick around for long and the ranking system is terrible!! the killer facecamps me after first hook and he ranks up and I derank it just doesnt make any sense.

The game has a good concept, but the game is not really rewarding. Survivors dont really have options to interact with the killer except for some niche perks. As a killer you dont really have to do anything except for run after a survivor and wait for bloodlust to catch up. If they add more opportunities for both side to interact with the opponent other than just run around and press m1 this might be a good game. 
Right now i cant recommend it unfortunately.

cool game

When I first saw this game, I knew that I would love it. I'm crazy about horror stuffs, characters and movies so It was love at first sight.. Should you enjoy these stuffs too, this game is made for ya!
This game is also good to play with your friends as survivor, and to discount your rage playing as killer when you are mad due to your daily basis haha
The content is awesome, the lore is amazing and entertaining, the game play is breathtaking!
Of course that there are some bugs, but they are working on it and improving this game increasingly and solving these problems.
THE GAME IS FUN, AND IT'S WORTH IT. TOUGH THERE ARE SOME TOXIC PLAYERS THAT YOU HAVE TO BE CAREFUL HAHA!
However, I recommend it 10x

[h1] Tras mas de 1000 horas de juego [/h1]

Tras muchas horas de juego, en solitario y en grupos de amigos recomiendo este juego.

Es un juego simple, donde o eres un superviviente que tiene que escapar junto a otros 3, reparando y dando vueltas a obstaculos de forma inteligente para burlar a tu perseguidor o eres un asesino que debe ser mas inteligente que el supervivientes y matarlo mental y fisicamente regalandoselo  sin piedad a tu dios, el ente. 

[u] [b] PROS: [/b][/u] 

[b] +  Curva de habilidad bien implementada[/b]
[b] +  Bastante contenido en Asesinos y buena cantidad de Supervivientes[/b]
[b] +  Cantidad exagerada para poder vestir a tu personaje favorito [/b]
[b] +  Cantidad de eventos y contenido nuevo cada mes, con enfoque a lo que la gente pide. [/b]

[u] [b] CONTRAS: [/b][/u] 

[b] -  Comunidad toxica (esto puede omitirse si es que desactivas el chat o eres una persona que no se frustra facilmente) [/b]

[b] -  Servidores un poco inestables en donde veras algunos hits falsos y cosas un poco raras  [/b]

[u] [b] Neutral : [/b][/u] 

[b] El balance del juego va cambiando tiempo a tiempo, lo que puede ser algo bueno o algo malo[/b]


[b] Personajes de tus peliculas y series favoritas jugables (algo neutral por las compras con dinero real) [/b]

This once was a game I thoroughly enjoyed playing but like all good things the woke ideologies seeps its way into everything fking entertaining and turns it to shit. Unfortunately, behavior is taking its game down this very road. Trying to pander and act inclusive but in all reality is being more divisive then anything. If I want to be lectured on politically driven agendas, I'd turn on the mainstream news or any mainstream streaming services for that matter since they all are going woke these days. Leave the politics to the politicians and keep your woke bs out of our games! Let players use their imagination. Quit forcing woke ideologies on us. Instead, leave shit ambiguous. Is that so hard? Farewell. We had a good run.

If you want to play killer, go for it. The new update slaughtered survivor gameplay. Killers can instantly catch up now and there are some perks that have become radically overpowered. I can not and will not change my review to be positive until things have changed.

Gra warta kupienia, ale ma na ten moment tak wiele błędów, że nie da się w nią grać z radością.
Serwery często się zwyczajnie pal, nie są w stanie utrzymać tak dużej ilości graczy. Hitboxy to jakiś żart, bo killer potrafi uderzyć ocalałego, gdy ten jest jakieś pięć metrów od niego, zwłaszcza po szybkim przeskoku przez okno albo przez paletę. Jeśli ktoś ma słabe nerwy i nie lubi przegrywać przez błędy gry to stanowczo nie polecam. Nie będę się wypowiadać na temat tego, jak toksyczni są gracze i jak rzadko zdarza się, by i survy i killerzy grali fair.
